dmca.title: Google DMCA - Jeremy Hier
dmca.body:
Google,

1) The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.best-plasma-televisions.com/sony-plasma-42-hdtv.html
published by best-plasma-televisions.com

http://www.hdtvs.name/sony-plasma-42-hdtv.html [content copied from best-plasma-televisions.com]

2) The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.best-plasma-televisions.com/sony-50-inch-plasma-tv.html
published by best-plasma-televisions.com

http://www.hdtvs.name/sony-50-inch-plasma-tv.html [content copied from best-plasma-televisions.com]

Upon further investigation all the content on hdtvs.name has been copied from best-plasma-televisions.com

I first started to receive Google Adsense page impressions for best-plasma-televisions.com on Aug. 22, 2005 [4 page impressions]

Please contact me at: hier@emailaccount.com

"I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law."
"I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

I request that the entire website hdtvs.name be removed.
Thank you.
Sincerely,
Jeremy Hier Feb. 2, 2007
P.S.I have also faxed this to (650)963-3255
